casebody.data:
Jere L. WENTZ, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. RUBBERSAN PRODUCTS, Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 85. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 7, 1931. Ashley & Foulds, of New York City (Andrew Foulds, Jr., of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Nelson Littell, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
